{{ listing.Price | currency:'NOK ' }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IListing } from './listing'; import { ListingService } from './listings.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-listingsgrid', templateUrl: './listingsgrid.component.html', styleUrls: ['./listingsgrid.component.css'] }) export class ListingsGridComponent implements OnInit { listings: IListing[] = []; // Array to store listings constructor(private listingService: ListingService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchListings(); } fetchListings(): void { this.listingService.getListings().subscribe( (data: IListing[]) => { this.listings = data; }, error => { console.error('Error fetching listings', error); } ); } }
